title: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description:
When editing XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then switching back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed stating that the changes need to be saved. However, the error message is not clear on how to save or discard the changes. The error message is titled 'Error' (including the quotes).

The expected behavior should be: 
- Clear and concise error message indicating that the XML Report Design has been changed
- The error message should not have quotes in the title
OB: If you edit the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then try to switch back to the Layout view, you will receive an error message stating 'Source page is dirty'. The user is left unsure of how to save or discard their changes.
EB: A better approach would be to display a clear error message stating that the XML Report Design has been changed. Additionally, the error message should have a better title that does not include quotes.
